name: Javed Afridi
comment: MY TEAM is an amazing Project. We have been using it since second season of PSL. Only twice we have failed to reach finals since season 2.

name: Salman Iqbal
comment: MY TEAM has added significant value to Karachi Kings. It has been very helpful for management department from drafting to Playing XI.

name: Aqib Javed
comment: We have subscribed to MY TEAM for last two seasons and it has proven real worth. Since that we have been one of the strongest opponent ot defeat.

name: Andy Flower
comment: Multan Sultan have always relied upon experienced players and MY TEAM is best option to analyse stats of experience players and go for the best ones.

name: Nadeem Omer
comment: Quetta Gladiators make look week on the paper but is strong on the field thanks to MY TEAM for it suggestions.

name: Ali Naqvi
comment: Our management has been most inconsistent throught season but we have highest win rate beacuase we use MY TEAM consistently since season 1.
